snippet: Liu Tienan was one of the first and most visible targets of the push by President Xi Jinping to take down both “tigers” and “flies” — powerful and minor officials.
abstract: Chinese court sentences former senior economic official Liu Tienan to life in prison after convicting him of taking bribes and abusing his power; Tienan is one of first targets of China’s continuing anticorruption campaign and is one of highest-ranking bureaucrats to have been sent to prison because of it.
lead_paragraph: Liu Tienan was one of the first and most visible targets of the push by President Xi Jinping to take down both “tigers” and “flies” — powerful and minor officials.

headline.main: A Top Target of China’s Graft Purge Gets Life in Prison
headline.print_headline: Life Sentence for Top Target in Graft Purge
